item.title: Gurugram high-end property demand softens; Noida holds strong amid supply shortage

review.headline_rewrite: Gurugram high-end property demand softens; Noida holds strong amid supply shortage
bullets: The report further added that buoyed by strong balance sheets and a focus on boosting pre-sales, competition for project acquisitions is intense.
While this is likely to put pressure on profit margins, companies with a healthy pipeline of ongoing projects over the next few years could
Whereas, units with higher ticket sizes greater than ₹20 million are also witnessing healthy absorption, but with some inducements, such as relaxed payment plans,

item.title: Stocks to buy under  ₹100: Sumeet Bagadia recommends three shares to buy on Monday — 8 September 2025

review.headline_rewrite: Stocks to buy under  ₹100: Sumeet Bagadia recommends three shares to buy on Monday — 8 September 2025
bullets: Indian stock market: The Indian stock market closed flat on Friday, September 5, as profit booking persisted amid worries over Trump’s tariffs and their
The Sensex and Nifty 50 opened on a positive note but were unable to sustain gains despite favorable global cues and expectations of a
The Sensex edged down by 7 points to close at 80,710.76, while the Nifty 50 gained 7 points to settle at 24,741.
The BSE Midcap index dipped 0.10 per cent, whereas the Smallcap index rose slightly by 0.09 per cent.

item.title: Adani Group looks to invest $60 billion in power, RE sectors till FY32

review.headline_rewrite: Adani Group looks to invest $60 billion in power, RE sectors till FY32
bullets: Industrialist Gautam Adani-led Adani Group is looking to invest around $60 billion up to FY32 in power sector, especially in renewables, generation and transmission/distribution.
In an investor presentation, Adani Power said the group plans $21 billion investment by FY30 to scale up renewable energy capacity to 50 GW
Part of the Adani Group, Adani Green Energy Ltd (AGEL) develops, builds, owns, operates and maintains utility-scale grid-connected solar and wind farm projects.
